label: Height Wrt Ground Is Overhead Level
def_question: Is the camera positioned at an overhead level throughout the video, above eye level but below aerial (around second-floor height)?
alt_question: Is the camera at an overhead level throughout the video?

def_prompt: The camera is positioned at an overhead level throughout the video, above eye level but below aerial (around second-floor height).
